name: RADION FM
description: RADION FM is a music streaming platform that creates genuine NFT music tracks with blockchain technology.

name: mp3tag.js
description: mp3tag.js is an open sourced JavaScript library used to edit the metadata of audio files. It currently supports ID3v1, ID3v2.3, and ID3v2.4 tags.

name: YouTube Downloader
description: YouTube Downloader is an open-sourced, easy-to-use, mobile-friendly, and ad-free YouTube video downloader/converter.

name: Printu
description: Printu is a start up cloud-based printing service which incorporates seamless transaction and convenient printing experience through Quick Response (QR) code.

name: TUPVLYMPICS'23
description: A simple website used for TUPV Intramurals

name: kanji.js
description: 漢字 search/lookup library for Node.js and browsers. It uses the KANJIDIC dictionary file to search/lookup for the characters. The dictionary file is included so that it will work with browsers. The size of the distributed file is about ~2MB.

name: URL Shortener
description: Easily shorten your URLs by using this tool. Reduce the length of long URLs into more nice and manageable links. You'll also be able to monitor traffic statistics of your links such as number of visits and referer.

name: Messenger Translator
description: Messenger Translator is a bot app built for Facebook's Messenger. It translates text in any language supported by Google Translate.
